title: Client Issues
body: Whenever I get about 30 minutes into a game i start lagging and then I start attempting to reconnect but it wont reconnect. I try to restart my client and then it wont let me log back in. This is the second game in a row that its happened and its getting so frustrating.

replies.body:
The issue you're describing often happens as a result of high packet buffering or packet loss. The root cause is often either incompatible local network configurations or issues along your route to the server. There are certainly a lot of steps that can be taken, but our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) lists the best steps to start with. 

Let me know if you continue to see this issue after working through the guide.
